long_description:
To multiply a scalar, use the MULTIPLY node.

Inputs
------
a : Matrix
    The input matrix to be multiplied to input b.
b : Matrix
    The input matrix to be multiplied to input a.
short_description: The DOT_PRODUCT node takes two input matrices, multiplies them (by dot product), and returns the result.

returns.description: The matrix result from the matrix multiplication.
